column1: Master of Science (Technology) in Computing Sciences and Electrical Engineering - System-on-Chip Design
column5: System-on-Chips run the world!System-on-Chips run the world everywhere as the heart of phones, computers, datacenters, buildings, factories, and anywhere data is processed. Tampere region has very strong industrial cluster in intelligent machines, embedded systems, and telecommunications demanding state-of-the art chips and the need for experts in the field SoC is great.Nokia designs the most advanced chips in Europe for 5G on the latest IC technology nodes in Finland. SoC Hub collected Tampere University and companies to create very large SoCs, for example the Headsail SoC with 330M transistors in 2023. The success is based on a three-decade expertise on FPGA and DSP based multiprocessor system designs in Tampere.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
